FuncDef: This command configures eth-ring compatibility version for the G.8032 state machine and messages. The default is version 2 and all router switches use version 2. If there is a need to interwork with third party devices that only support version 1 this can be set to version 1.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the version of the G.8032 state machine. Values-1, 2.
